description: Crafted in Italy, this hoodie is updated for Fall 2022 with a lightweight cotton blend and the stacked "RL" logo.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 20" shoulder, a 44" chest, and a 35" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. "Ralph Lauren" script embroidered at the right cuff.
Stacked "RL" logo embroidered at the left chest.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
